title: Girl, 14, accidentally shot on Northwest Side
content:
A 14-year-old girl walked into Community First Medical Center after being accidentally shot Sunday at a park on the Northwest Side, police said.
The girl came into the hospital Tuesday with a gunshot wound to her knee, said Chicago Police News Affairs Officer Hector Alfaro.
Police said she was with friends at a neighborhood park in the afternoon Sunday in the 5200 block of West Fullerton Avenue in the Cragin neighborhood when a gun the group was playing with accidentally discharged, Alfaro said.
The girl was listed in good condition, police said.
No other information was immediately available about the incident.
